message.content:
cs.CV, cs.IT, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM

Reasoning: The paper deals with image reconstruction and denoising, which are common topics in computer vision (cs.CV) and multimedia (cs.MM). The use of Markov random fields (MRFs) and Gaussian mixture models (GMMs) suggests a focus on machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The analytical framework for computing MAP estimates suggests a focus on information theory (cs.IT).
